item.description:
This month's area ice breaker will be at the Cambridge Brewing Company...



Let's break the ice and meet each other. Busy people can't always hike, but getting away for a few hours close to home is always fun. This is a hiker's meetup that the weather will not affect.
It will only cost you the price of your meal, bring cash to help settle the tab easier.

Use the website directions.



Have fun!

Due to the popularity of these events, please keep your RSVP's up to date. We have to call the Brewery for reservations by Thursday evening.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting in the lobby from 7-7:15pm. I'm going to to suggest mingling around the bar area and grabbing tables if they are available. I will keep the host/hostess updated on where we are.
item.name: Random and New England Hiking Groups Ice Breaker!
